Meaning: be covered; take (time, money, etc.); be subjected to; (engine) starts
cover; take (one's time); start (an engine), multiply
move; work (a machine); set in motion
be away from, be apart (in age, etc.)
be tidied; be finished; be settled
not finish (eating); only (something) remains, leave behind
(a hole) opens; be vacant; be avaiable
open (a hole); vacate (a seat); keep open (a date)
